name: Amanda's Quinoa Salad
author: Catherine Tobin
summary: This is my stepdaughter Amanda's concoction, I had it once and was hooked! Keep it in the fridge all the time!
ingredients: 1 bunch green onions, chopped (green parts only)
1 tablespoon French vinaigrette (such as Briannas Home Style®)
directions: Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Transfer quinoa to a bowl and fluff with a fork
Stir mango salsa, green onions, cranberries, sunflower kernels, champagne vinegar, and French vinaigrette into the quinoa
Refrigerate salad at least 4 hours before serving
